content: Generally for the first half of 2023, we expect to generate cash from all sources of between $80 million and $100 million offset by total capital expenditures of $45 million to $55 million, debt service payments and other accruals of approximately $45 million and other expenses of $10 million for a cumulative expenditures of between $95 million and $110 million and by anticipated SG&A expenses of between $12 million and $13 million per quarter or approximately $25 million for the first half of the year.
